name: mikroe.click.c6dofimu23
short_description: 6DOF IMU 23 Click is a compact add-on board for precise motion tracking and measurement. This board features the IIM-20670, a high-performance 6-axis MotionTracking device from TDK InvenSense that integrates a 3-axis gyroscope and a 3-axis accelerometer. The gyroscope offers a full-scale range of up to ±1966 dps with high accuracy, while the accelerometer provides a range of ±2g to ±65g. Key features also include a 10MHz SPI interface, shock tolerance up to 10,000 g, on-chip 16-bit ADCs, and low current consumption.
